definition.title: Service API success rate by Client(includes client side error like EntityNotExists)

queries.query: avg:cadence_frontend.cadence_latency.quantile{(operation NOT IN (pollfordecisiontask,pollforactivitytask,getworkflowexecutionhistory,queryworkflow,listworkflowexecutions,listclosedworkflowexecutions,listopenworkflowexecutions)) AND $env AND $Availability_Zone AND $pXXLatency} by {operation}
queries.name: query1
